text:
He thought those seven years felt like just seven days. But he had no clue that this fresh start wouldn’t come easy. He’d have to work hard for it and endure a lot of pain. 

This marks the start of a new chapter—his journey of change, where he evolves from one version of himself to another. It’s about stepping into a whole new life that’s waiting for him. That could be a cool story to tell, but for now, our current tale wraps up here.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The page concludes with the idea that the protagonist's journey towards renewal and regeneration marks the beginning of a new story, while the current narrative has come to an end.
